trans-unit.source: Represents a writer that provides a fast, non-cached, forward-only way to generate streams or files that contain XML data.
trans-unit.target: 表示寫入器，其可提供快速、非快取的順向方法來產生含有 XML 資料之資料流或檔案。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> class writes XML data to a stream, file, text reader, or string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>類別會將 XML 資料寫入資料流、 檔案、 文字讀取器或字串。

trans-unit.source: It supports the W3C [Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 (fourth edition)](http://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/) and [Namespaces in XML 1.0 (third edition)](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/) recommendations.
trans-unit.target: 它支援 W3C[可延伸標記語言 (XML) 1.0 （第四版）](http://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/)和[XML 1.0 中的命名空間 （第三個版本）](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/)建議。

trans-unit.source: The members of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> class enable you to:
trans-unit.target: 成員<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>類別可讓您：

trans-unit.source: Verify that the characters are legal XML characters and that element and attribute names are valid XML names.
trans-unit.target: 驗證字元是否為合法 XML 字元，以及項目與屬性名稱是否為有效的 XML 名稱。

trans-unit.source: Verify that the XML document is well-formed.
trans-unit.target: 驗證 XML 文件的格式是否正確。

trans-unit.source: Encode binary bytes as Base64 or BinHex, and write out the resulting text.
trans-unit.target: 將二進位資料編碼為 Base64 或 BinHex，並寫出產生的文字。

trans-unit.source: Pass values by using common language runtime types instead of strings, to avoid having to manually perform value conversions.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免需要手動執行值的轉換，而不是字串，使用 common language runtime 類型傳遞值。

trans-unit.source: Write multiple documents to one output stream.
trans-unit.target: 將多份文件寫至一個輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Write valid names, qualified names, and name tokens.
trans-unit.target: 寫入有效的名稱、限定名稱，以及名稱語彙基元。

trans-unit.target: 本節內容：

trans-unit.target: [寫入項目](#writing_elements)

trans-unit.target: [寫入屬性](#writing_attributes)

trans-unit.target: [處理命名空間](#handling_ns)

trans-unit.target: [寫入具型別資料](#writing_types)

trans-unit.source: Creating an XML writer
trans-unit.target: 建立 XML 寫入器

trans-unit.source: To create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> instance, use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>執行個體，使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: To specify the set of features you want to enable on the XML writer, pass an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings> to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Create%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 指定您想要的 XML 寫入器上啟用的功能的設定，傳遞<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings>至<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Create%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, default settings are used.
trans-unit.target: 否則，會使用預設設定。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Create%2A> reference pages for details.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Create%2A>參考頁面的詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: Specifying the output format
trans-unit.target: 指定的輸出格式

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings> class includes several properties that control how <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> output is formatted:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings>類別包含數個屬性可控制如何<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>輸出格式：

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Specifies the text encoding to use.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的文字編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: The default is `Encoding.UTF8`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `Encoding.UTF8`。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to indent elements.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否縮排項目。

trans-unit.source: The default is `false` (no indentation).
trans-unit.target: 預設值是`false`（沒有縮排）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the character string to use when indenting.
trans-unit.target: 指定縮排時要使用的字元字串。

trans-unit.source: The default is two spaces.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為兩個空格。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the character string to use for line breaks.
trans-unit.target: 指定用於分行符號的字元字串。

trans-unit.source: The default is `\r\n` (carriage return, line feed).
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `\r\n` (歸位字元、換行字元)。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how to handle newline characters.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何處理新行字元。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to write attributes on a new line.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否要在新行上寫入屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Indent%2A> should be set to `true` when using this property.
trans-unit.target: 使用此屬性時，應將 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Indent%2A> 設為 `true`。

trans-unit.source: The default is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to write an XML declaration.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否撰寫 XML 宣告。

trans-unit.source: The default is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Indent%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.IndentChars%2A> properties control how insignificant white space is formatted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Indent%2A> 及 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.IndentChars%2A> 屬性控制如何格式化非顯著泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, to indent element nodes:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要縮排元素節點：

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.NewLineOnAttributes%2A> to write each attribute on a new line with one extra level of indentation:
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.NewLineOnAttributes%2A>利用縮排一個額外層級的新行上撰寫每個屬性：

trans-unit.source: Data conformance
trans-unit.target: 資料一致性

trans-unit.source: An XML writer uses two properties from the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings> class to check for data conformance:
trans-unit.target: XML 寫入器會使用兩個屬性，從<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings>資料一致性檢查的類別：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.CheckCharacters%2A> property instructs the XML writer to check characters and throw an <xref:System.Xml.XmlException> exception if any characters are outside the legal range, as defined by the W3C.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.CheckCharacters%2A>屬性會指示檢查的字元，而且會擲回的 XML 寫入器<xref:System.Xml.XmlException>如果任何字元都是在合法的範圍之外，如 W3C 所定義的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.ConformanceLevel%2A> property configures the XML writer to check that the stream being written complies with the rules for a well-formed XML 1.0 document or document fragment, as defined by the W3C.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.ConformanceLevel%2A>屬性會設定要檢查正在寫入的資料流符合規則的語式正確的 XML 1.0 文件或文件片段，如 W3C 所定義的 XML 寫入器。

trans-unit.source: The three conformance levels are described in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 下表中詳述的三個一致性層級。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Xml.ConformanceLevel.Document>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <xref:System.Xml.ConformanceLevel.Document>。

trans-unit.source: For details, see the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.ConformanceLevel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property and the <xref:System.Xml.ConformanceLevel?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.ConformanceLevel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性和<xref:System.Xml.ConformanceLevel?displayProperty=nameWithType>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Level
trans-unit.target: 層級

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The XML output conforms to the rules for a well-formed XML 1.0 document and can be processed by any conforming processor.
trans-unit.target: XML 輸出符合格式正確的 XML 1.0 版文件的規則，而且可以由任何合格的處理器來處理。

trans-unit.source: The XML output conforms to the rules for a well-formed XML 1.0 document fragment.
trans-unit.target: XML 輸出符合格式正確的 XML 1.0 版文件片段的規則。

trans-unit.source: The XML writer determines which level of conformation checking to apply (document or fragment) based on the incoming data.
trans-unit.target: XML 寫入器會決定包含要套用檢查 （文件或片段） 根據內送資料的層級。

trans-unit.source: Writing elements
trans-unit.target: 寫入項目

trans-unit.source: You can use the following <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> methods to write element nodes.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用下列<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>方法來寫入項目節點。

trans-unit.source: For examples, see the methods listed.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱所列的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use
trans-unit.target: 使用

trans-unit.source: To
trans-unit.target: 以

trans-unit.source: Write an entire element node, including a string value.
trans-unit.target: 編寫整個項目節點，其中包括字串值。

trans-unit.source: To write an element value by using multiple method calls.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用多個方法呼叫，以寫入項目值。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A> to write a typed value, <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteCharEntity%2A> to write a character entity, <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteAttributeString%2A> to write an attribute, or you can write a child element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以呼叫 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A> 寫入具型別值、呼叫 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteCharEntity%2A> 寫入字元實體、呼叫 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteAttributeString%2A> 寫入屬性，或者可以寫入項目子系。

trans-unit.source: This is a more sophisticated version of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteElementString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這是更趨精密完美的版本<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteElementString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To close the element, you call the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteEndElement%2A> or <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteFullEndElement%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要關閉項目，請呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteEndElement%2A>或<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteFullEndElement%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To copy an element node found at the current position of an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要複製項目節點的目前位置找到<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>或<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>物件。

trans-unit.source: When called, it copies everything from the source object to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> instance.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此方法時，它會將來源物件中的所有內容複製到 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Writing attributes
trans-unit.target: 寫入屬性

trans-unit.source: You can use the following <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> methods to write attributes on element nodes.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用下列<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>方法來寫入項目節點上的屬性。

trans-unit.source: These methods can also be used to create namespace declarations on an element, as discussed in the next section.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法也可用來建立命名空間宣告項目，在下一節中所述。

trans-unit.source: Use
trans-unit.target: 使用

trans-unit.source: To
trans-unit.target: 以

trans-unit.source: To write an entire attribute node, including a string value.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入整個屬性節點，其中包括字串值。

trans-unit.source: To write the attribute value using multiple method calls.
trans-unit.target: 若要撰寫使用多個方法呼叫的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A> to write a typed value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A>寫入具類型的值。

trans-unit.source: This is a more sophisticated version of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteElementString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這是更趨精密完美的版本<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteElementString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To close the element, you call the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteEndAttribute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要關閉項目，請呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteEndAttribute%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To copy all the attributes found at the current position of an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要在目前的位置找到的所有屬性都複製<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>物件。

trans-unit.source: The attributes that are written depend on the type of node the reader is currently positioned on:
trans-unit.target: 寫入的屬性取決於讀取器目前所在的節點的類型：

trans-unit.source: - For an attribute node, it writes the current attribute, and then the rest of the attributes until the element closing tag.
trans-unit.target: -若為屬性節點，它會將目前的屬性，然後其餘屬性寫入結尾標記的項目之前。

trans-unit.source: - For an element node, it writes all attributes contained by the element.
trans-unit.target: -若為項目節點，它會寫入元素所包含的所有屬性。

trans-unit.source: - For an XML declaration node, it writes all the attributes in the declaration.
trans-unit.target: -若為 XML 宣告節點，它會寫入所有屬性宣告中。

trans-unit.source: - For all other node types, the method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: -若為所有其他節點型別，方法會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Handling namespaces
trans-unit.target: 處理命名空間

trans-unit.source: Namespaces are used to qualify element and attribute names in an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間用於對 XML 文件中的項目與屬性名稱進行限定。

trans-unit.source: Namespace prefixes associate elements and attributes with namespaces, which are in turn associated with URI references.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間前置詞將關聯的命名空間，而接著相關聯的 URI 參考的項目和屬性。

trans-unit.source: Namespaces create element and attribute name uniqueness in an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間會在 XML 文件中建立項目和屬性名稱唯一性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> maintains a namespace stack that corresponds to all the namespaces defined in the current namespace scope.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>維護命名空間堆疊，對應至目前的命名空間範圍中定義的所有命名空間。

trans-unit.source: When writing elements and attributes you can utilize namespaces in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 當寫入項目及屬性時，可透過下列方式利用命名空間：

trans-unit.source: Declare namespaces manually by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteAttributeString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 宣告命名空間，以手動方式使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteAttributeString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This can be useful when you know how to best optimize the number of namespace declarations.
trans-unit.target: 當知道如何最佳化命名空間宣告數目時，這便會很有用。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteAttributeString%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteAttributeString%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: Override the current namespace declaration with a new namespace.
trans-unit.target: 使用新的命名空間覆寫目前的命名空間宣告。

trans-unit.source: In the following code, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteAttributeString%2A> method changes the namespace URI for the `"x"` prefix from `"123"` to `"abc"`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼，<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteAttributeString%2A>方法變更命名空間 URI 的`"x"`前置詞`"123"`至`"abc"`。

trans-unit.source: The code generates the following XML string:
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會產生下列 XML 字串：

trans-unit.source: Specify a namespace prefix when writing attributes or elements.
trans-unit.target: 寫入屬性或項目時，指定命名空間前置詞。

trans-unit.source: Many of the methods used to write element and attributes enable you to do this.
trans-unit.target: 許多用來寫入項目和屬性的方法可讓您執行這項操作。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteStartElement%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29> method writes a start tag and associates it with a specified namespace and prefix.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteStartElement%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29>方法寫入的開頭標記，並將它與指定的命名空間與前置詞產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: Writing typed data
trans-unit.target: 寫入具型別資料

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A> method accepts a common language runtime (CLR) object, converts the input value to its string representation according to XML schema definition language (XSD) data type conversion rules, and writes it out by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A>方法可接受的 common language runtime (CLR) 物件、 將輸入的值轉換為其字串表示，根據 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 資料類型轉換規則，並將它編寫寫入使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This is easier than using the methods in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert> class to convert the typed data to a string value before writing it out.
trans-unit.target: 這是比使用中的方法更容易<xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert>類別，以寫出之前，將具類型的資料轉換成字串值。

trans-unit.source: When writing to text, the typed value is serialized to text by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert> rules for that schema type.
trans-unit.target: 寫入文字，具類型的值序列化為文字使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert>該結構描述類型的規則。

trans-unit.source: For default XSD data types that correspond to CLR types, see the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 預設 XSD 資料型別對應至 CLR 型別，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> can also be used to write to an XML data store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>也可用來寫入 XML 資料存放區。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class can create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object to create nodes for an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 類別可以建立 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> 物件，以建立 <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> 物件的節點。

trans-unit.source: If the data store has schema information available to it, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A> method throws an exception if you try to convert to a type that is not allowed.If the data store does not have schema information available to it, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A> method treats all values as an `xsd:anySimpleType` type.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料存放區的結構描述資訊可用，<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A>方法擲回例外狀況，如果您嘗試轉換成不允許的類型。如果資料存放區並沒有結構描述資訊提供給它，<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A>方法會將所有的值視為`xsd:anySimpleType`型別。

trans-unit.source: Closing the XML writer
trans-unit.target: 關閉的 XML 寫入器

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> methods to output XML, the elements and attributes are not written until you call the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>輸出 XML 的元素和屬性的方法不會寫入，直到您呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are using <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> to populate an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object, you won't be able to see the written elements and attributes in the target document until you close the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> instance.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>填入<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>物件，您將無法看到寫入的元素和屬性的目標文件中，直到您關閉<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous programming
trans-unit.target: 非同步程式設計

trans-unit.source: Most of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> methods have asynchronous counterparts that have "Async" at the end of their method names.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>方法都有非同步的對應具有"Async"結尾的方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, the asynchronous equivalent of <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteAttributeString%2A> is <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteAttributeStringAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，非同步的對等<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteAttributeString%2A>是<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteAttributeStringAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A> method, which doesn't have an asynchronous counterpart, convert the return value to a string and use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteStringAsync%2A> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A>方法，沒有非同步的對應項目，將傳回的值轉換為字串，然後再使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteStringAsync%2A>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: Security considerations
trans-unit.target: 安全性考量

trans-unit.source: Consider the following when working with the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> class:
trans-unit.target: 使用時，請考慮下列<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>類別：

trans-unit.source: Exceptions thrown by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> can disclose path information that you do not want bubbled up to the app.
trans-unit.target: 擲回例外狀況<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>可以揭露您不想要的路徑資訊反昇至應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Your app must catch exceptions and process them appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 您的應用程式必須捕捉例外狀況，並予以適當處理。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> does not validate any data that is passed to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteDocType%2A> or <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteRaw%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> 不會驗證傳遞至任何資料<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteDocType%2A>或<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteRaw%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You should not pass arbitrary data to these methods.
trans-unit.target: 您不應該對這些方法傳遞任意資料。

trans-unit.source: The following example code shows how to use the asynchronous API to generate XML.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用非同步 API 來產生 XML。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, closes this stream and the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，關閉這個資料流和基礎資料流。

trans-unit.source: Any elements or attributes left open are automatically closed.
trans-unit.target: 自動關閉任何項目或屬性保持開啟狀態。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> methods to output XML, the elements and attributes will not be written until you call the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>將不會寫入到輸出 XML 的元素和屬性的方法，直到您呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are using the XmlWriter to populate an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, until you close the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>, you will not be able to observe the written elements and attributes in the target document.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您要使用 XmlWriter 填入<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>，除非您關閉<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>，不能觀察目標文件中的屬性與寫入的項目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在先前的非同步作業完成前呼叫了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 與「非同步作業已經在進行中」的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Some of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Create%2A> overloads include a `settings` parameter that accepts an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings> object.
trans-unit.target: 部分<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Create%2A>多載包括`settings`參數可接受<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can use this object to:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此物件來：

trans-unit.source: Specify which features you want supported on the created <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在建立支援哪些功能<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>物件。

trans-unit.source: Reuse the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings> object to create multiple writer objects.
trans-unit.target: 重複使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings>物件來建立多個寫入器物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings> object is copied and marked read-only for each created writer.
trans-unit.target: 複製每個已建立之寫入器的 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings> 物件，並標示為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Changes to the settings on an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings> instance do not affect existing writers with the same settings.
trans-unit.target: 對 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings> 執行個體上設定的變更不會影響具有相同設定的現有寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Thus, you can use the same settings to create multiple writers with the same functionality.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您可以使用相同設定來建立具有相同功能的多個寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Or, you can modify the settings on an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings> instance and create a new writer with a different set of features.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以修改 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings> 執行個體上的設定，並建立具有一組不同功能的新寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Add features to an existing XML writer.
trans-unit.target: 將功能加入現有的 XML 寫入器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Create%2A> method can accept another <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Create%2A> 方法可以接受其他 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object does not have to be an XML writer created by the static <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Create%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 基礎<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>物件沒有建立靜態的 XML 寫入器<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Create%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a user-defined XML writer to add additional features to.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定要加入其他功能的使用者定義 XML 寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Take full advantage of features such as better conformance checking and compliance to the [XML 1.0 recommendation](http://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/) that are available only on <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> objects created by the static <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Create%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 充分利用功能較佳的一致性檢查和相容性，例如[XML 1.0 版建議事項](http://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/)只上可用的<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>建立由靜態物件<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Create%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the features to support on the created writer, use an overload that takes an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings> object as one of its arguments, and pass in an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings> object with your custom settings.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要指定要在建立的寫入器上支援的功能，使用多載採用<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings>物件做為其引數，其中，並傳入<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings>物件的自訂設定。

trans-unit.source: Also, XmlWriter always writes a Byte Order Mark (BOM) to the underlying data stream; however, some streams must not have a BOM.
trans-unit.target: 此外，XmlWriter 一律會寫入位元組順序標記 (BOM) 到基礎資料流。不過，某些資料流必須不會有 BOM。

trans-unit.source: To omit the BOM, create a new <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings> object and set the Encoding property to be a new <xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding> object with the Boolean value in the constructor set to false.
trans-unit.target: 若要省略 BOM，建立新<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings>物件，並設定新的編碼屬性<xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>物件建構函式設為 false 的布林值。

trans-unit.source: XmlWriter always writes a Byte Order Mark (BOM) to the underlying data stream; however, some streams must not have a BOM.
trans-unit.target: XmlWriter 一律將位元組順序標記 (BOM) 寫入至基礎資料流。不過，某些資料流必須不會有 BOM。

trans-unit.source: To omit the BOM, create a new <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings> object and set the Encoding property to be a new <xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding> object with the Boolean value in the constructor set to false.
trans-unit.target: 若要省略 BOM，建立新<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings>物件，並設定新的編碼屬性<xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>物件建構函式設為 false 的布林值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在先前的非同步作業完成前呼叫了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message “An asynchronous operation is already in progress.”
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，會擲回包含「非同步作業已經在進行中」訊息的 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 類別所使用的資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 類別目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在先前的非同步作業完成前呼叫了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 與「非同步作業已經在進行中」的訊息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在先前的非同步作業完成前呼叫了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 與「非同步作業已經在進行中」的訊息。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, flushes whatever is in the buffer to the underlying streams and also flushes the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將緩衝區的所有內容清空至基礎資料流，然後清空基礎資料流。

trans-unit.source: This is called instead of <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A> when you want to write more to the underlying stream without losing what is still in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 這稱為而不是<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A>當您想要撰寫更多基礎資料流而不會遺失什麼仍在緩衝區中。

trans-unit.source: For the asynchronous version of this method, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.FlushAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.FlushAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously flushes whatever is in the buffer to the underlying streams and also flushes the underlying stream.

trans-unit.source: The task that represents the asynchronous <see langword="Flush" /> operation.

trans-unit.source: This is the asynchronous version of <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Flush%2A>, with the same functionality.

trans-unit.source: To use this method, you must set the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Async%2A> flag to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此方法，您必須設定<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Async%2A>旗標設為`true`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> asynchronous method was called without setting the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Async" /> flag to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 在未將 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Async" /> 旗標設為 <see langword="true" />的情況下呼叫了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 非同步方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "Set XmlWriterSettings.Async to true if you want to use Async Methods."
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，就會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 並顯示訊息「如果您要使用非同步方法，請將 XmlWriterSettings.Async 設為 true」。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings> object returned by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Settings%2A> property cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings>所傳回物件<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Settings%2A>無法修改屬性。

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to change individual settings results in an exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 任何嘗試變更個別的設定會造成擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在先前的非同步作業完成前呼叫了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 與「非同步作業已經在進行中」的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlReader" /> from which to copy the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 要複製屬性的 <see langword="XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to copy the default attributes from the <see langword="XmlReader" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要從 <see langword="true" /> 複製預設屬性，則為 <see langword="XmlReader" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, writes out all the attributes found at the current position in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，寫出在 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 的目前位置找到的所有屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the reader is positioned on an `element` node `WriteAttributes` copies all the contained attributes.
trans-unit.target: 如果讀取器位於`element`節點`WriteAttributes`複製所有包含的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the reader is positioned on an `attribute` node, this method writes the current attribute, then the rest of the attributes until the element closing tag.
trans-unit.target: 如果讀取器位於`attribute` 節點，這個方法會寫入目前的屬性，則其餘屬性結尾標記的項目之前。

trans-unit.source: If the reader is positioned on an `XmlDeclaration` node, this method writes all the attributes in the declaration.
trans-unit.target: 如果讀取器位於`XmlDeclaration` 節點，這個方法會寫入所有屬性宣告中。

trans-unit.source: If the reader is positioned on any other node type this method throws an <xref:System.Xml.XmlException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果讀取器在任何其他節點類型，這個方法會擲回<xref:System.Xml.XmlException>。

trans-unit.source: If this method is called using <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>, to ensure well-formed XML any content (which has been expanded from the entities) that could result in an invalid document is replaced when written.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個方法會呼叫使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>，以確保寫入時，會取代任何內容 （已展開的實體），可能會導致無效的文件格式正確的 XML。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an attribute includes an `>` entity that has been expanded, to ensure a well-formed document the expanded > is replaced when written out with `>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果屬性包含`>`已擴充，以確保正確格式的文件展開的實體 > 以寫出時，取代`>`。

trans-unit.source: For the asynchronous version of this method, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteAttributesAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteAttributesAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example copies all the elements to the output, changes the tag names to upper case, and copies all the attributes unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將所有項目複製到輸出，將標記名稱變更為大寫，並將複製未變更的所有屬性。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the file, `test1.xml`, as input.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用該檔案，`test1.xml`作為輸入。

trans-unit.source: `WriteAttributeString` does the following:
trans-unit.target: `WriteAttributeString` 會執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: If the attribute value includes double or single quotes, they are replaced with `"` and `'` respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性值包含雙引號或單一引號，取代了它們`"`和`'`分別。

trans-unit.source: If writing an `xml:space` attribute, the writer verifies the attribute value is valid.
trans-unit.target: 如果撰寫`xml:space`屬性寫入器會驗證屬性值是否有效。

trans-unit.source: (Valid values are `preserve` or `default`.)
trans-unit.target: (有效值為`preserve`或`default`。)

trans-unit.source: If writing an `xml:lang` attribute, the writer does not verify that the attribute value is valid according to the W3C XML 1.0 recommendation.
trans-unit.target: 如果撰寫`xml:lang`屬性寫入器不會驗證屬性值是根據 W3C XML 1.0 recommendation 有效。

trans-unit.source: For the asynchronous version of this method, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteAttributeStringAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteAttributeStringAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Byte array to encode.
trans-unit.target: 要編碼的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The position in the buffer indicating the start of the bytes to write.
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區中的位置指示要寫入的位元組開頭。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to write.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, encodes the specified binary bytes as Base64 and writes out the resulting text.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，以 Base64 格式編碼指定的二進位位元組，並寫出產生的文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, the byte buffer may contain the binary contents of a GIF image.
trans-unit.target: 例如，位元組緩衝區可能包含 GIF 影像的二進位內容。

trans-unit.source: This clearly would not be valid XML.
trans-unit.target: 這顯然不是有效的 XML。

trans-unit.source: The `Base64` encoding is designed to represent arbitrary byte sequences in a text form comprised of the 65 US-ASCII characters ([A-Za-z0-9+/=]) where each character encodes 6 bits of the binary data.
trans-unit.target: `Base64`編碼方式設計來代表任意位元組序列組成 65 US-ASCII 字元以文字形式 ([A-a-za-z0-9 + =])，每個字元都會編碼的二進位資料的 6 位元。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Requests for Comments (RFC) 1521 located on the Request for Comments Web site at http://www.rfc-editor.org/.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱要求建議 (RFC) 上的註解的網站要求 1521年http://www.rfc-editor.org/。

trans-unit.source: Special handling must be done to ensure the `WriteChars` method does not split surrogate pair characters across multiple buffer writes.

trans-unit.source: The XML specification defines the valid ranges for surrogate pairs.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, writes out a comment <!--...--> containing the specified text.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，寫出包含指定文字的註解 <!--...-->。

trans-unit.source: If `text` is either `null` or `String.Empty`, this method writes a comment with no data content, for example \<!---->.
trans-unit.target: 如果`text`是`null`或`String.Empty`，這個方法會寫入註解沒有資料內容，例如\<！--->。

trans-unit.source: If `text` contains an invalid sequence of two dashes "--" the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> can either throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException> (<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextWriter> objects) or insert a space between the dashes "- -" so that the text is a valid XML comment (<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> objects created by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Create%2A> method).
trans-unit.target: 如果`text`包含無效的序列的兩個連字號"-"<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>可以是 throw <xref:System.ArgumentException> (<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextWriter>物件) 或連字號之間插入空格 [-] 以便文字是有效的 XML 註解 (<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>所建立的物件<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Create%2A>方法)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the DOCTYPE.
trans-unit.target: DOCTYPE 名稱。

trans-unit.source: This must be non-empty.
trans-unit.target: 這必須不是空白的。

trans-unit.source: If non-null it also writes PUBLIC "pubid" "sysid" where <c>pubid</c> and <c>sysid</c> are replaced with the value of the given arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果為非 null，它也會寫入 PUBLIC "pubid" "sysid"，其中 <c>pubid</c> 與 <c>sysid</c> 會取代為指定引數的值。

trans-unit.source: If <c>pubid</c> is <see langword="null" /> and <c>sysid</c> is non-null it writes SYSTEM "sysid" where <c>sysid</c> is replaced with the value of this argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>pubid</c> 是 <see langword="null" />，而 <c>sysid</c> 為非 null，則它會寫入 SYSTEM "sysid"，其中 <c>sysid</c> 會取代為這個引數的值。

trans-unit.source: If non-null it writes [subset] where subset is replaced with the value of this argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果非 Null，它會寫入 [subset]，其中 subset 由這個引數的值來替代。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, writes the DOCTYPE declaration with the specified name and optional attributes.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，寫入具有指定名稱與選擇性屬性的 DOCTYPE 宣告。

trans-unit.source: This method does not check for invalid characters in `pubid`, `sysid` or `subset`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會檢查無效的字元`pubid`，`sysid`或`subset`。

trans-unit.source: It also does not check that the internal subset is well-formed.
trans-unit.target: 它也不會檢查內部子集是語式正確。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在先前的非同步作業完成前呼叫了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 與「非同步作業已經在進行中」的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The value for <paramref name="name" /> would result in invalid XML.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 的值將導致無效的 XML。

trans-unit.source: The name of the DOCTYPE.
trans-unit.target: DOCTYPE 名稱。

trans-unit.source: This must be non-empty.
trans-unit.target: 這必須不是空白的。

trans-unit.source: If non-null it also writes PUBLIC "pubid" "sysid" where <c>pubid</c> and <c>sysid</c> are replaced with the value of the given arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果為非 null，它也會寫入 PUBLIC "pubid" "sysid"，其中 <c>pubid</c> 與 <c>sysid</c> 會取代為指定引數的值。

trans-unit.source: If <c>pubid</c> is <see langword="null" /> and <c>sysid</c> is non-null it writes SYSTEM "sysid" where <c>sysid</c> is replaced with the value of this argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>pubid</c> 是 <see langword="null" />，而 <c>sysid</c> 為非 null，則它會寫入 SYSTEM "sysid"，其中 <c>sysid</c> 會取代為這個引數的值。

trans-unit.source: If non-null it writes [subset] where subset is replaced with the value of this argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果非 Null，它會寫入 [subset]，其中 subset 由這個引數的值來替代。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously writes the DOCTYPE declaration with the specified name and optional attributes.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="localName" /> value is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="localName" /> 值為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The parameter values are not valid.
trans-unit.target: 參數值無效。

trans-unit.source: There is a character in the buffer that is a valid XML character but is not valid for the output encoding.
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區中有一個字元，其為有效的 XML 字元，但對輸出編碼而言無效。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the output encoding is ASCII, you should only use characters from the range of 0 to 127 for element and attribute names.
trans-unit.target: 比方說如果輸出的編碼方式為 ASCII，您應該在項目與屬性名稱中只使用範圍從 0 至 127 的字元。

trans-unit.source: The invalid character might be in the argument of this method or in an argument of previous methods that were writing to the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 無效的字元可能是在這個方法的引數中，或在先前已寫入至緩衝區的方法的引數中。

trans-unit.source: Such characters are escaped by character entity references when possible (for example, in text nodes or attribute values).
trans-unit.target: 字元實體參考會盡可能逸出這類字元 (比方說在文字節點或屬性值中)。

trans-unit.source: However, the character entity reference is not allowed in element and attribute names, comments, processing instructions, or CDATA sections.
trans-unit.target: 不過，在項目與屬性名稱、註解、處理指示或 CDATA 區段中不允許字元實體參考。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, closes the previous <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteStartAttribute(System.String,System.String)" /> call.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會關閉先前的 <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteStartAttribute(System.String,System.String)" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: If you call `WriteStartAttribute`, you can close the attribute with this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫`WriteStartAttribute`，您可以關閉使用此方法的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also close the attribute by calling `WriteStartAttribute` again, calling <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteAttributeString%2A>, or calling <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteEndElement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以藉由呼叫關閉屬性`WriteStartAttribute`再次呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteAttributeString%2A>，或呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteEndElement%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> methods to output XML, the elements and attributes will not be written until you call the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>將不會寫入到輸出 XML 的元素和屬性的方法，直到您呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are using the XmlWriter to populate an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, until you close the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>, you will not be able to observe the written elements and attributes in the target document.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您要使用 XmlWriter 填入<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>，除非您關閉<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>，不能觀察目標文件中的屬性與寫入的項目。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, closes any open elements or attributes and puts the writer back in the Start state.

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "Set XmlWriterSettings.Async to true if you want to use Async Methods."
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，就會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 並顯示訊息「如果您要使用非同步方法，請將 XmlWriterSettings.Async 設為 true」。

trans-unit.source: If the element contains no content, a short end tag "/>" is written; otherwise, a full end tag is written.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目不包含任何內容，簡短結束標記 」 / > 「 寫入;否則，會寫入完整的結束標記。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> methods to output XML, the elements and attributes will not be written until you call the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>將不會寫入到輸出 XML 的元素和屬性的方法，直到您呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are using the XmlWwriter to populate an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, until you close the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>, you will not be able to observe the written elements and attributes in the target document.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您用來填入 XmlWwriter <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>，除非您關閉<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>，不能觀察目標文件中的屬性與寫入的項目。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, writes out the specified name, ensuring it is a valid name according to the W3C XML 1.0 recommendation (http://www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-xml-19980210#NT-Name).

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextWriter.Namespaces%2A> is set to `true`, `WriteName` also checks that the name is also valid according to the W3C Namespaces in XML recommendation.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextWriter.Namespaces%2A>設`true`，`WriteName`也會檢查名稱是否有效，根據 W3C Namespaces in XML 建議事項。

trans-unit.target: 將來源物件中的每個項目複製到目前的寫入器執行個體。

trans-unit.target: 要從其中讀取的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to copy the default attributes from the <see langword="XmlReader" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要從 <see langword="true" /> 複製預設屬性，則為 <see langword="XmlReader" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, copies everything from the reader to the writer and moves the reader to the start of the next sibling.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，從讀取器複製所有內容至寫入器，並將讀取器移至下一個同層級 (Sibling) 的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the supported node types for this method.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示支援的節點型別，此方法。

trans-unit.source: NodeType
trans-unit.target: NodeType

trans-unit.source: WriteNode Behavior
trans-unit.target: WriteNode 行為

trans-unit.source: Writes out all the nodes irrespective of type.
trans-unit.target: 寫出不論類型為何的所有節點。

trans-unit.source: That is, the writer consumes the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> and writes out all the nodes read including attributes, processing instructions, comments, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 也就是寫入器會消耗<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>並寫出所有節點讀取包括屬性、 處理指示、 註解等等。

trans-unit.source: This situation occurs when the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is in an initial state.
trans-unit.target: 發生這種情況時<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>處於初始狀態。

trans-unit.source: (The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property returns `ReaderState.Initial`).
trans-unit.target: (<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會傳回`ReaderState.Initial`)。

trans-unit.source: Writes out the element node and any attribute nodes.
trans-unit.target: 寫出項目節點和任何屬性節點。

trans-unit.source: No operation.
trans-unit.target: 無作業。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteStartAttribute%2A> or <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteAttributeString%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: 請改用 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteStartAttribute%2A> 或 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteAttributeString%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Writes out the text node.
trans-unit.target: 寫出文字節點。

trans-unit.source: Writes out the CDATA section node.
trans-unit.target: 寫出 CDATA 區段節點。

trans-unit.source: Writes out the entity reference node.
trans-unit.target: 寫出實體參考節點。

trans-unit.source: Writes out the processing instruction node.
trans-unit.target: 寫出處理指示節點。

trans-unit.source: Writes out the comment node.
trans-unit.target: 寫出註解節點。

trans-unit.source: Writes out the document type node.
trans-unit.target: 寫出文件類型節點。

trans-unit.source: Writes out the significant white space node.
trans-unit.target: 寫出顯著泛空白字元節點。

trans-unit.source: Writes out the white space node.
trans-unit.target: 寫出泛空白字元節點。

trans-unit.source: Writes out the end element tag.
trans-unit.target: 寫出結尾項目標記。

trans-unit.source: No operation.
trans-unit.target: 無作業。

trans-unit.source: Writes out the XML declaration node.
trans-unit.target: 寫出 XML 宣告節點。

trans-unit.source: If the reader is in the initial state, this method moves the reader to the end of file.
trans-unit.target: 如果讀取器中的初始狀態，這個方法會將讀取器移至檔案結尾。

trans-unit.source: If the reader is already at the end of file or in a closed state, this method is non-operational.
trans-unit.target: 如果讀取器已經在檔案結尾，或處於已關閉狀態，這個方法是無法操作。

trans-unit.source: The following C# code copies an entire XML input document to the console:
trans-unit.target: 下列 C# 程式碼會將整個 XML 輸入文件複製到主控台：

trans-unit.source: If you have moved off the root node and are positioned elsewhere in the document the following C# example correctly writes out the nodes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已關閉的根節點都放置在正確，下列 C# 範例會寫出該節點的文件的其他位置。

trans-unit.source: If the reader is configured to return white space and the writer has is configured to indent output, `WriteNode` may produce strange output.
trans-unit.target: 如果讀取器設定為會傳回空白字元，而且寫入器已設定為縮排輸出，`WriteNode`可能會產生奇怪的輸出。

trans-unit.source: You will essentially be getting double formatting.
trans-unit.target: 您實際上將得到雙精度浮點格式。

trans-unit.source: For the asynchronous version of this method, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteNodeAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteNodeAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example writes the first and last book nodes out to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會寫出至主控台的第一個和最後一個書籍節點。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the file, `books.xml`, as input.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用該檔案，`books.xml`作為輸入。

trans-unit.source: Writes out all the nodes irrespective of type.
trans-unit.target: 寫出不論類型為何的所有節點。

trans-unit.source: That is, the writer consumes the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> and writes out all the nodes from the root node (including attributes, processing instructions, comments and so on.)
trans-unit.target: 也就是寫入器會消耗<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>並寫出所有節點，從根節點 （包括屬性、 處理指示、 註解等等）。

trans-unit.source: Writes out the element node and any attribute nodes.
trans-unit.target: 寫出項目節點和任何屬性節點。

trans-unit.source: Writes out the text node.
trans-unit.target: 寫出文字節點。

trans-unit.source: No operation.
trans-unit.target: 無作業。

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteStartAttribute%2A>或<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteAttributeString%2A>方法寫入命名空間宣告。

trans-unit.source: Writes out the processing instruction node.
trans-unit.target: 寫出處理指示節點。

trans-unit.source: Writes out the comment node.
trans-unit.target: 寫出註解節點。

trans-unit.source: Writes out the significant white space node.
trans-unit.target: 寫出顯著泛空白字元節點。

trans-unit.source: Writes out the white space node.
trans-unit.target: 寫出泛空白字元節點。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, writes out a processing instruction with a space between the name and text as follows: <?name text?>.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，寫出名稱與文字之間有空白的處理指示，如下所示：<?name text?>。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to write the XML declaration (rather than <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteStartDocument%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以用來撰寫 XML 宣告 (而非<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteStartDocument%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: This could result in the encoding attribute being incorrectly written.
trans-unit.target: 這可能導致錯誤寫入編碼屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following C# code would result in an invalid XML document because the default encoding is UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列 C# 程式碼會產生無效的 XML 文件中，因為預設的編碼為 utf-8。

trans-unit.source: If `text` is either `null` or `String.Empty`, this method writes a `ProcessingInstruction` with no data content, for example \<?name?>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`text`是`null`或`String.Empty`，這個方法會寫入`ProcessingInstruction`沒有資料內容，例如\<？ 名稱？ >。

trans-unit.source: If text contains an invalid sequence of "?>", the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> can either throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException> (<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextWriter> objects) or insert a space "?
trans-unit.target: 如果文字包含無效的序列"？ >"，<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>可以是 throw <xref:System.ArgumentException> (<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextWriter>物件) 或插入空格 」？

trans-unit.source: >" to avoid writing invalid XML (<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> objects created by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Create%2A> method).
trans-unit.target: > 「 若要避免撰寫不正確的 XML (<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>所建立的物件<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Create%2A>方法)。

trans-unit.source: This method looks up the prefix that is in scope for the given namespace.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會查詢在指定之命名空間範圍中的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: If `ns` maps to the current default namespace, no prefix is generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果`ns`產生對應至目前的預設命名空間，沒有前置詞。

trans-unit.source: When writing attribute values, this method generates a prefix if `ns` is not found.
trans-unit.target: 當寫入屬性值，這個方法會產生前置詞如果`ns`找不到。

trans-unit.source: When writing element content, it throws an exception if `ns` is not found.
trans-unit.target: 當寫入項目內容，它會擲回例外狀況如果`ns`找不到。

trans-unit.source: If a class derived from the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> does not override this method `localName` is not checked to be a valid W3C XML name.

trans-unit.source: In such case, before calling this method, the validity of the string can be checked by <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.IsName%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在這種情況下，才能呼叫這個方法，該字串的有效性可以檢查<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.IsName%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: There is a character in the buffer that is a valid XML character but is not valid for the output encoding.
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區中有一個字元，其為有效的 XML 字元，但對輸出編碼而言無效。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the output encoding is ASCII, you should only use characters from the range of 0 to 127 for element and attribute names.
trans-unit.target: 比方說如果輸出的編碼方式為 ASCII，您應該在項目與屬性名稱中只使用範圍從 0 至 127 的字元。

trans-unit.source: The invalid character might be in the argument of this method or in an argument of previous methods that were writing to the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 無效的字元可能是在這個方法的引數中，或在先前已寫入至緩衝區的方法的引數中。

trans-unit.source: Such characters are escaped by character entity references when possible (for example, in text nodes or attribute values).
trans-unit.target: 字元實體參考會盡可能逸出這類字元 (比方說在文字節點或屬性值中)。

trans-unit.source: However, the character entity reference is not allowed in element and attribute names, comments, processing instructions, or CDATA sections.
trans-unit.target: 不過，在項目與屬性名稱、註解、處理指示或 CDATA 區段中不允許字元實體參考。

trans-unit.target: 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteStartDocumentAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, writes the XML declaration with the version "1.0".
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，使用「1.0」版寫入 XML 宣告。

trans-unit.source: The encoding level of the document is determined by how the writer is implemented.
trans-unit.target: 寫入器實作的方式取決於文件的編碼方式的層級。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an <xref:System.Text.Encoding> object is specified in the `XmlTextWriter` constructor, this determines the value of the encoding attribute.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Text.Encoding>中指定物件`XmlTextWriter`建構函式，這會決定編碼屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: This method does not create a standalone attribute.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會建立獨立屬性。

trans-unit.source: When `WriteStartDocument` is called the writer validates that what you are writing is a well-formed XML document.
trans-unit.target: 當`WriteStartDocument`呼叫寫入器會驗證您要撰寫是否格式正確的 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, it checks that the XML declaration is the first node, that one and only one root-level element exists, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 例如，它會檢查 XML 宣告，第一個節點，其中，只能有一個根層級項目存在，以此類推。

trans-unit.source: If this method is not called, the writer assumes an XML fragment is being written and applies no root level rules.
trans-unit.target: 如果未呼叫此方法，則寫入器會假設正在寫入的 XML 片段，並不套用任何根層級的規則。

trans-unit.source: If `WriteStartDocument` has been called and then the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteProcessingInstruction%2A> method is used to create another XML declaration, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果`WriteStartDocument`已經呼叫，然後<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteProcessingInstruction%2A>方法可用來建立另一個 XML 宣告，將會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For the asynchronous version of this method, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteStartDocumentAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteStartDocumentAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在先前的非同步作業完成前呼叫了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 與「非同步作業已經在進行中」的訊息。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, it writes "standalone=yes"; if <see langword="false" />, it writes "standalone=no".
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" />，它會寫入「standalone=yes」；如果 <see langword="false" />，它會寫入「standalone=no」。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, writes the XML declaration with the version "1.0" and the standalone attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，使用「1.0」版寫入 XML 宣告與獨立屬性。

trans-unit.source: The encoding level of the document is determined by how the writer is implemented.
trans-unit.target: 寫入器實作的方式取決於文件的編碼方式的層級。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an <xref:System.Text.Encoding> object is specified in the `XmlTextWriter` constructor, this determines the value of the encoding attribute.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Text.Encoding>中指定物件`XmlTextWriter`建構函式，這會決定編碼屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: When `WriteStartDocument` is called, the writer validates that what you are writing is a well-formed XML document.
trans-unit.target: 當`WriteStartDocument`是呼叫，寫入器會驗證您要撰寫是否格式正確的 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, it checks that the XML declaration is the first node, that one and only one root-level element exists, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 例如，它會檢查 XML 宣告，第一個節點，其中，只能有一個根層級項目存在，以此類推。

trans-unit.source: If this method is not called, the writer assumes an XML fragment is being written and applies no root level rules.
trans-unit.target: 如果未呼叫此方法，則寫入器會假設正在寫入的 XML 片段，並不套用任何根層級的規則。

trans-unit.source: If `WriteStartDocument` has been called and then the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteProcessingInstruction%2A> method is used to create another XML declaration, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果`WriteStartDocument`已經呼叫，然後<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteProcessingInstruction%2A>方法可用來建立另一個 XML 宣告，將會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> asynchronous method was called without setting the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Async" /> flag to <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.

trans-unit.source: There is a character in the buffer that is a valid XML character but is not valid for the output encoding.
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區中有一個字元，其為有效的 XML 字元，但對輸出編碼而言無效。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the output encoding is ASCII, you should only use characters from the range of 0 to 127 for element and attribute names.
trans-unit.target: 比方說如果輸出的編碼方式為 ASCII，您應該在項目與屬性名稱中只使用範圍從 0 至 127 的字元。

trans-unit.source: The invalid character might be in the argument of this method or in an argument of previous methods that were writing to the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 無效的字元可能是在這個方法的引數中，或在先前已寫入至緩衝區的方法的引數中。

trans-unit.source: Such characters are escaped by character entity references when possible (for example, in text nodes or attribute values).
trans-unit.target: 字元實體參考會盡可能逸出這類字元 (比方說在文字節點或屬性值中)。

trans-unit.source: However, the character entity reference is not allowed in element and attribute names, comments, processing instructions, or CDATA sections.
trans-unit.target: 不過，在項目與屬性名稱、註解、處理指示或 CDATA 區段中不允許字元實體參考。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的本機名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI to associate with the element.
trans-unit.target: 與項目相關聯的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: If this namespace is already in scope and has an associated prefix, the writer automatically writes that prefix also.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個命名空間已經在範圍中並具有相關聯的前置詞，則寫入器也會自動寫入前置詞。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, writes the specified start tag and associates it with the given namespace.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，寫入指定的開頭標記並與指定的命名空間產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: After calling this method you can either write attributes, or create content using <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteComment%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteString%2A>, or `WriteStartElement` for child elements.

trans-unit.source: You can close the element with either <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteEndElement%2A> or <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteFullEndElement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以關閉其中一種項目<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteEndElement%2A>或<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteFullEndElement%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The text to write.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的文字。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, writes the given text content.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，寫入指定的文字內容。

trans-unit.source: `WriteString` does the following:
trans-unit.target: `WriteString` 會執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: The characters `&`, `<`, and `>` are replaced with `&`, `<`, and `>`, respectively.

The default behavior of an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> created using <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Create%2A> is to throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException> when attempting to write character values in the range 0x-0x1F (excluding white space characters 0x9, 0xA, and 0xD).
trans-unit.target: 預設行為<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>使用建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Create%2A>會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentException>時嘗試寫入的字元值範圍從 0 x-0x1F （不含空白字元 0x9、 0xA 和為 0xD） 中。

trans-unit.source: These invalid XML characters can be written by creating the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> with the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.CheckCharacters%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 可以寫入這些無效的 XML 字元，藉由建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>與<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.CheckCharacters%2A>屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: Doing so will result in the characters being replaced with numeric character entities (&\#0; through &#0x1F).
trans-unit.target: 這樣會導致數字字元實體所取代的字元 (（& s)\#0; 透過 & #0x1F)。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, an <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextWriter> created with the `new` operator will replace the invalid characters with numeric character entities by default.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextWriter>以建立`new`運算子將會使用數字字元實體無效的字元取代預設值。

trans-unit.source: **Note** Microsoft does not encourage the practice of writing invalid XML characters since many applications that consume XML are not designed to handle invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**Microsoft 不會鼓勵寫入無效的 XML 字元，因為許多取用 XML 的應用程式並非設計來處理無效的字元的作法。

trans-unit.source: If `WriteString` is called in the context of an attribute value, double and single quotes are replaced with `"` and `'` respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果`WriteString`呼叫在屬性值的內容中，以取代 double 和單一引號`"`和`'`分別。

trans-unit.source: For example, this input string `test<item>test` is written out as
trans-unit.target: 這在輸入字串，例如`test<item>test`寫出做為

trans-unit.source: If `text` is either `null` or `String.Empty`, this method writes a text node with no data content.
trans-unit.target: 如果`text`是`null`或`String.Empty`，這個方法會寫入任何資料內容與文字節點。

trans-unit.source: For the asynchronous version of this method, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteStringAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteStringAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example writes an XML node.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會寫入 XML 節點。

trans-unit.target: 這是非同步版本<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteString%2A>，使用相同的功能。

trans-unit.source: To use this method, you must set the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Async%2A> flag to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此方法，您必須設定<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Async%2A>旗標設為`true`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> asynchronous method was called without setting the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Async" /> flag to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 在未將 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Async" /> 旗標設為 <see langword="true" />的情況下呼叫了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 非同步方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "Set XmlWriterSettings.Async to true if you want to use Async Methods."
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，就會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 並顯示訊息「如果您要使用非同步方法，請將 XmlWriterSettings.Async 設為 true」。

trans-unit.source: The low surrogate.
trans-unit.target: 低 Surrogate。

trans-unit.source: This must be a value between 0xDC00 and 0xDFFF.
trans-unit.target: 這必須是一個介於 0xDC00 和 0xDFFF 之間的值。

trans-unit.source: The high surrogate.
trans-unit.target: 高 Surrogate。

trans-unit.source: This must be a value between 0xD800 and 0xDBFF.
trans-unit.target: 這必須一個是介於 0xD800 和 0xDBFF 之間的值。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, generates and writes the surrogate character entity for the surrogate character pair.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，產生和寫入 Surrogate 字元字組的 Surrogate 字元實體。

trans-unit.source: This method is only applicable on systems that use UTF-16 encoding.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法僅適用於使用 utf-16 編碼的系統上。

trans-unit.source: The surrogate character entity is written in hexadecimal format.
trans-unit.target: 以十六進位格式寫入 surrogate 字元實體。

trans-unit.source: The range for surrogate characters is #x10000 to #x10FFFF.
trans-unit.target: Surrogate 字元的範圍是以 #x10FFFF #x 10000。

trans-unit.source: The following formula is used to generate the surrogate character entity: (`highChar` -0xD800) * 0x400 + (`lowChar` -0xDC00) + 0x10000
trans-unit.target: 下列公式用來產生 surrogate 字元實體: (`highChar` -0xD800) * 0x400 + (`lowChar` -0xDC00) + 0x10000

trans-unit.source: For both HTML and XML, the document character set (and therefore the notation of numeric character references) is based on UCS [ISO-10646].
trans-unit.target: HTML 和 XML 文件的字元集 （以及數字字元參考的標記法） 根據 UCS [ISO 10646]。

trans-unit.source: A single numeric character reference in a source document may therefore in some cases correspond to two 16-bit units in a string (a high surrogate and a low surrogate).
trans-unit.target: 來源文件中的單一數字字元參考可能因此在某些情況下對應到兩個 16 位元單位數 （為高 surrogate 和低 surrogate） 的字串。

trans-unit.source: These 16-bit units are referred to as a surrogate pair.
trans-unit.target: 這些 16 位元的單位稱為 「 surrogate 字組 」。

trans-unit.source: For more information regarding surrogates or characters, refer to section 3.7 of the Unicode 3.0/Unicode 2.0 standard located at http://www.unicode.org, or section 2.2 of the W3C XML 1.0 Recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml#charsets.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 (instance) 或字元的詳細資訊，請參閱的區段 3.7 Unicode standard 3.0/Unicode 2.0 位於http://www.unicode.org，2.2 小節 W3C XML 1.0 版建議事項位於或http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml#charsets。

trans-unit.source: For the asynchronous version of this method, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteSurrogateCharEntityAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteSurrogateCharEntityAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在先前的非同步作業完成前呼叫了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 與「非同步作業已經在進行中」的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Writes a single simple-typed value.
trans-unit.target: 寫入單一簡單類型的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A> method accepts common language runtime (CLR) simple-typed values, converts them to their string representations according to the XML schema definition language (XSD) data type conversion rules, and writes them out by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A>方法接受 common language runtime (CLR) 簡單類型值、 將它們轉換成其字串表示法，根據 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 資料類型轉換規則，以及使用縮小寫入<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to pipeline simple-type values with minimal reparsing overhead when passing data between <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>, and <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> objects.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您管線與最小重新剖析額外負荷傳遞之間的資料時的簡單型別值<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>， <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>，和<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>物件。

trans-unit.source: This ability is also useful when dealing with CLR simple-types and an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> instance.
trans-unit.target: 這項功能時也很有用處理 CLR 簡單類型和<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A> method to write the typed value instead of using the methods in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert> class to convert the typed data to a string value before writing it out.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A>方法寫入具類型的值，而非使用中的方法<xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert>類別，以寫出之前，將具類型的資料轉換成字串值。

trans-unit.source: For asynchronous operations, convert the return value of <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A> to a string and use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteStringAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 非同步作業，將轉換的傳回值<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A>到字串，使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteStringAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the default XSD data types that correspond to CLR types.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的預設 XSD 資料型別對應至 CLR 型別。

trans-unit.source: If the CLR object is a list type, such as <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>, <xref:System.Collections.IList>, or <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>, it is treated as an array of the value type.
trans-unit.target: 如果 CLR 物件是清單型別 (如 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>、<xref:System.Collections.IList> 或 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>)，則會將其視為數值型別的陣列。

trans-unit.source: They do not have corresponding <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 不會具有對應的<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A> is called multiple times in succession, the values are not delimited by a space.
trans-unit.target: 如果連續多次呼叫 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A>，則不會使用空格分隔各個值。

trans-unit.source: You must call <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteWhitespace%2A> between calls to <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A> to insert white space.
trans-unit.target: 您必須在呼叫 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteWhitespace%2A> 之間呼叫 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A>，以插入泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value to write.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Writes a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 寫入 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This method takes the common language runtime object and converts the input value to the desired output type using the XML Schema definition language (XSD) data type conversion rules.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會採用 common language runtime 物件，並將輸入的值轉換成使用 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 資料類型轉換規則所需的輸出類型。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A> method is called, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> converts the value to its string representations according to the XML Schema (XSD) data type rules and writes it out using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A> 方法時，<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> 會根據 XML 結構描述 (XSD) 資料型別規則將值轉換成其字串表示，並使用 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteString%2A> 方法將其寫出。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A> is called multiple times in succession, the values are not delimited by a space.
trans-unit.target: 如果連續多次呼叫 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A>，則不會使用空格分隔各個值。

trans-unit.source: You must call <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteWhitespace%2A> between calls to <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A> to insert white space.
trans-unit.target: 您必須在呼叫 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteWhitespace%2A> 之間呼叫 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A>，以插入泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: Pass an array type to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> overload to write out an array of distinct values.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞至陣列型別<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>多載以寫出相異值的陣列。

trans-unit.source: If this method is called on an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> instance that outputs text-only, the typed value is serialized to text.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法會在呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>純文字，具類型的值序列化成文字，該輸出執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For asynchronous operations, convert the return value of this method to a string and use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteStringAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 非同步作業，將這個方法的傳回值轉換為字串，並使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteStringAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.target: 如果連續多次呼叫 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A>，則不會使用空格分隔各個值。

trans-unit.source: You must call <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteWhitespace%2A> between calls to <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A> to insert white space.
trans-unit.target: 您必須在呼叫 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteWhitespace%2A> 之間呼叫 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%2A>，以插入泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: Pass an array type to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> overload to write out an array of distinct values.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞至陣列型別<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteValue%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>多載以寫出相異值的陣列。

trans-unit.source: If this method is called on an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> instance that outputs text-only, the typed value is serialized to text.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法會在呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>純文字，具類型的值序列化成文字，該輸出執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For asynchronous operations, use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteStringAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 非同步作業，使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteStringAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An invalid value was specified.
trans-unit.target: 指定了無效的值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在先前的非同步作業完成前呼叫了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 與「非同步作業已經在進行中」的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The string of white space characters.
trans-unit.target: 空白字元的字串。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, writes out the given white space.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，寫出指定的空白字元。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to manually format your document.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來手動格式化文件。

trans-unit.source: For the asynchronous version of this method, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteWhitespaceAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteWhitespaceAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The string contains non-white space characters.
trans-unit.target: 字串包含非泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在先前的非同步作業完成前呼叫了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 與「非同步作業已經在進行中」的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The string of white space characters.
trans-unit.target: 空白字元的字串。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously writes out the given white space.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步的方式寫出指定的空白字元。

trans-unit.source: The task that represents the asynchronous <see langword="WriteWhitespace" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步 <see langword="WriteWhitespace" /> 作業的工作。

trans-unit.source: This is the asynchronous version of <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteWhitespace%2A>, with the same functionality.
trans-unit.target: 這是非同步版本<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteWhitespace%2A>，使用相同的功能。

trans-unit.source: To use this method, you must set the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Async%2A> flag to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此方法，您必須設定<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Async%2A>旗標設為`true`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> asynchronous method was called without setting the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Async" /> flag to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 在未將 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings.Async" /> 旗標設為 <see langword="true" />的情況下呼叫了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 非同步方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "Set XmlWriterSettings.Async to true if you want to use Async Methods."
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，就會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 並顯示訊息「如果您要使用非同步方法，請將 XmlWriterSettings.Async 設為 true」。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the current <see langword="xml:lang" /> scope.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得目前<see langword="xml:lang" />範圍。

trans-unit.source: The current <see langword="xml:lang" /> scope.
trans-unit.target: 目前的 <see langword="xml:lang" /> 範圍。

trans-unit.source: This property allows one component to find out in what state another component has left the writer.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性允許一個元件，以找出哪種狀態另一個元件已離開寫入器。

trans-unit.source: For example, perhaps one component wants to tell another which language help text to generate.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可能是一個元件要通知另產生哪一個語言的說明文字。

trans-unit.source: The language information is communicated by writing an `xml:lang` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 語言資訊藉由撰寫溝通`xml:lang`屬性。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在先前的非同步作業完成前呼叫了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 與「非同步作業已經在進行中」的訊息。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSpace" /> representing the current <see langword="xml:space" /> scope.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得表示目前 <see langword="xml:space" /> 範圍的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSpace" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="XmlSpace" /> representing the current <see langword="xml:space" /> scope.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="XmlSpace" />，表示目前的 <see langword="xml:space" /> 範圍。

trans-unit.target: 這可讓一個元件，找出另一個元件中的寫入器所處的狀態。
